Name: Secreted Proteins Via GO Annotation And WoLF PSORT For shCTSB Paper
Tools:
bg_uniq, uniprot, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, tp_sorted_uniq, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, tp_cut_tool, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
get_subontology_from, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, wolf_psort, tp_easyjoin_tool
